label: 皇帝
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: a Chinese style denoting the sovereign that came into use at the Yamato court in the later seventh century. It appears, for instance, in the Chinese poems of the ↓Kaifūsō 懐風藻 written during Tenji's reign at Ōtsu. [天智、大津]
